meanings.definition: A venomous snake of the genus Dendroaspis.
meanings.sent1: The mambas slithered silently through the grass.
meanings.sent2: Watch out for mambas when hiking in Africa.
meanings.sent3: The mambas decided to have a race to see who was the fastest snake.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp words were like the bite of a mamba, leaving a lasting sting.
meanings.sent5: The mambas' green scales shimmered in the sunlight, a warning of danger.

meanings.definition: A fast-moving, highly venomous snake found in Africa.
meanings.sent1: In the dense jungle, the mambas swiftly moved through the trees.
meanings.sent2: Local guides warned about the deadly mambas in the area.
meanings.sent3: The mambas challenged the cheetah to a race, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as quick and deadly as a strike from a mamba.
meanings.sent5: The mambas' speed was unmatched, a blur of danger in the grass.

meanings.definition: Any of several venomous African snakes of the genus Dendroaspis.
meanings.sent1: The zoo had a display showcasing different types of mambas.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the behavior of various mambas in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The mambas gathered for a family reunion, hissing happily.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like the strike of multiple mambas, leaving chaos in their wake.
meanings.sent5: The mambas' colors varied, each one a deadly beauty in its own right.
